ygData.subject: anybody home?
ygData.msgSnippet: Seems our precious highway of information has died again. I d like to resuscitate (can t spell) it again ...at least for a while.  The onelist-paladins are
ygData.messageBody:
Seems our precious highway of information has died again.
I'd like to resuscitate (can't spell) it again ...at least for a while. The
onelist-paladins are having a field-day -- i've never seen a list so
chatterish.
En tout cas, let's discuss some high level fletching, shall we? I think it
would be great if we all shared what we know of Oak and Darkwood bows to
help each other.
For instance, at what level do oak bows become trivial (hemp, silk, shaped,
cam).
What about Darkwood?
Most especially, what is a safe skill to attempt to make a Darkwood (hemp,
shaped, etc.)
At skill 132 i made my first oak-hemp. I have successfully made 3 for 3 up
to my present skill of 171. It also takes me about 20plat of investment to
go up one skill point.

More topics of discussion: What is the point of class 4-5-6 arrows? You can
create same dmg arrows in class 1-2-3; using cheaper components! They're
more expensive and aren't any more accurate.

Well, that's my two cents.
Jarron of Sol-Ro (surnameless)
